Yuma.KQSR:
KQSR is a commercial hot adult contemporary music radio station in Yuma, Arizona also serving El Centro, California, broadcasting on 100.9 FM.
The station used to be known as "The Jet" and aired a classic rock format. It adopted the slogan "Star 100.9" and aired an adult contemporary format. The program Director since May, 2009 is Jeff Edwards, who also hosts the weekday midday show from 10am-3pm.
